languages.text: "Как есть отбирают, Ваша Светлость! И жируют на наши пайки!" {n}Работяга шепчет обвинения, зажмурившись и будто не веря свалившемуся на него счастью.{/n}

"They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как есть отбирают, Ваша Светлость! И жируют на наши пайки!" {n}Работяга шепчет обвинения, зажмурившись и будто не веря свалившемуся на него счастью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So they are, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And they live the high life spending our ration cards!" {n}The worker's eyes are shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

"So they are, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And they live the high life spending our ration cards!" {n}The worker's eyes are shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

"They most definitely do appropriate our ration cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

"They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

"They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Sí que se llevan nuestras tarjetas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Y engordan usándolas!». {n}Los ojos del trabajador se cierran con fuerza cuando susurra sus acusaciones. Parece que no puede creer su suerte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí que se llevan nuestras tarjetas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Y engordan usándolas!». {n}Los ojos del trabajador se cierran con fuerza cuando susurra sus acusaciones. Parece que no puede creer su suerte.{/n}

languages.text: 「あいつらは俺たちのカードを奪ってるんだ、閣下！そして奪ったカードを自分で使って肥え太る！」{n}告発の言葉をつぶやいている労働者は、目を強く閉じている。どうやら自分の幸運が信じらずにいるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あいつらは俺たちのカードを奪ってるんだ、閣下！そして奪ったカードを自分で使って肥え太る！」{n}告発の言葉をつぶやいている労働者は、目を強く閉じている。どうやら自分の幸運が信じらずにいるようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “他们抢走了我们的配给卡，大人！他们私吞了我们的配给。”{n}这个工人低声谴责着执法者，紧紧闭着眼睛，似乎不敢相信好运真的降临在了他身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们抢走了我们的配给卡，大人！他们私吞了我们的配给。”{n}这个工人低声谴责着执法者，紧紧闭着眼睛，似乎不敢相信好运真的降临在了他身上。{/n}

languages.text: "Sie nehmen unsere Marken an sich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Sie verbrauchen sie selbst und werden dadurch fett!" {n}Der Arbeiter schließt fest die Augen, als er seine Anschuldigung flüstert. Er scheint sein Glück nicht fassen zu können.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie nehmen unsere Marken an sich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Sie verbrauchen sie selbst und werden dadurch fett!" {n}Der Arbeiter schließt fest die Augen, als er seine Anschuldigung flüstert. Er scheint sein Glück nicht fassen zu können.{/n}

languages.text: « Si, Votre Seigneurie, ils nous prennent nos tickets, je vous jure ! Et ils les utilisent pour s'engraisser ! » {n}murmure l'ouvrier en gardant les yeux fermés, comme s'il avait du mal à croire en sa chance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si, Votre Seigneurie, ils nous prennent nos tickets, je vous jure ! Et ils les utilisent pour s'engraisser ! » {n}murmure l'ouvrier en gardant les yeux fermés, comme s'il avait du mal à croire en sa chance.{/n}

languages.text: "Kartlarımıza el koyuyorlar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sonra da kartları kendileri kullanıp göbeklerini şişiriyorlar!" {n}İşçi, suçlamalar ağzından fısıltıyla çıkarken gözlerini sımsıkı kapıyor. Şansının böylesine yaver gittiğine inanamıyor gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They do take our cards, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! And then grow fat using them for themselves!" {n}The worker's eyes squeeze shut tightly as he whispers his accusations. He seems unable to believe his stroke of luck.{/n}
